name: SIZE
helpText: Sets the size of the button.

name: STYLE
helpText: Sets the style of the button. Use the "Simple" option for secondary actions or sets of buttons. Use the "Remove UI Decoration" option to make the button appear as text.

name: BUTTON_SET
helpText: Enables you to group many buttons together into a pill. You can use this option to specify where the button is within this set. Set the option to Default if this button is not part of a button set.

name: ICON_POSITION
helpText: Sets the position of the icon relative to the label.

name: WIDTH
helpText: Sets the width of the button.

name: SPACING_LEFT
helpText: Controls the spacing to the left of the button.

name: SPACING_RIGHT
helpText: Controls the spacing to the right of the button.

name: SPACING_TOP
helpText: Controls the spacing to the top of the button.

name: SPACING_BOTTOM
helpText: Controls the spacing to the bottom of the button.
